title: A Last Competitive New York Marathon for Abdi Abdirahman
description: Abdi Abdirahman will run his last competitive New York City Marathon on Sunday. Next year, he expects to return “with the masses, with a bunch of friends,” for the fun of it.
dc:creator: Scott Cacciola
media:credit: Karsten Moran for The New York Times
media:description: Abdi Abdirahman, who is a five-time Olympian, will run his final competitive New York City Marathon this Sunday.
